flawed_nl_solution:
Last year he had 39 cows - 25 cows - 6 cows = <<39-25-6=4>>4 cows.
This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 4 cows + 24 cows = <<4+24=28>>28 cows.
After he bought more cows he now has 28 cows + 43 cows = <<28+43=71>>71 cows.
After his friend gave him cows he now has 71 cows + 8 cows = <<71+8=79>>79 cows.
#### 79

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
